ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Subscription Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Man...I feel bad now.  I placed my order the day the store opened, and of course I paid for overnight just in case.  Well...when I found out that they had just
ygData.messageBody:
Man...I feel bad now. I placed my order the day the store opened,
and of course I paid for overnight just in case. Well...when I found out
that
they had just started taking orders and that it wouldnt SHIP until the
11th...
I was one of those "WHy the hell did you charge me overnight then you
goits!"
people. Well...Turns out I was lucky as hell. Mine shipped and got here
on the
14th.

They DID send a shipment confirmation e-mail to me, so I wouldnt worry
about that.

I think they should offer to cancel orders that havent shipped and let you
go buy it in stores on monday if you want to. The upgrade came with a
cloth map ( pretty crappy craftmanship comared to the Ultima cloth ones
though...)
but it didnt come with a new manual. If the retail one comes with a new
maual with iskar history/art/whatever....it will make me mad.
I love aving those little things...:( *sniff* oh well...

For comfort I'll say that it hasnt done me any good to have it.
The only thing I see is that now on the server select screen it says
"Kunark Enabled" Thats it. If you have a level 50 you could be
exp's now...but other than that its nothing big.

Good luck with your orders though.

P.S. Oh! the upgrade also comes with a card advertising the
new line of EQ toys...and you can cash it in for a free SharkJaw
Cutlass toy..:) pretty cool...however it wont ship to you until
SEPTEMBER 30th!

AUGH...oh well..:)


------------------------------------------------------------------ ~ -------
Robert McDonnell . .
http://www.mindspring.com/~sigma7 / V \
ICQ: 6694071 /(linux)\
"I think I can fly...probably just falling" ^^ ^^
